title: Dip Configuration Schema
description: Schema for the dip.yml configuration file

version.description: Specifies the minimum required version of Dip
version.errorMessage: The 'version' field is required and must be a string.

files.description: Array of strings representing paths to Docker Compose files
files.errorMessage: Error in 'compose.files': must be an array of strings.

project_name.description: Specifies the project name for Docker Compose
project_name.errorMessage: Error in 'compose.project_name': must be a string.

command.description: Specifies an alternative Docker Compose command
command.errorMessage: Error in 'compose.command': must be a string.

compose.errorMessage: Error in 'compose': must be an object with properties 'files', 'project_name', and 'command'.

interaction.description: Defines the commands and their configurations
interaction.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction': must be an object with valid command configurations.

provision.description: Lists the commands to be executed for provisioning
provision.errorMessage: Error in 'provision': must be an array of strings.

environment.description: Defines environment variables for the configuration
environment.errorMessage: Error in 'environment': must be an object with properties representing environment variables, each being a string.

namespace.description: Specifies the Kubernetes namespace to use
namespace.errorMessage: Error in 'kubectl.namespace': must be a string.

kubectl.errorMessage: Error in 'kubectl': must be an object with properties representing Kubernetes configuration.

modules.description: Array of strings representing the names of module files to be included
modules.errorMessage: Error in 'modules': must be an array of strings representing module file names.

git.description: Specifies the Git repository URL for the service

ref.description: Specifies the Git reference (branch, tag, or commit) to use

path.description: Specifies the local path to the service

^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$.errorMessage: Error in 'infra': must be an object with properties representing infrastructure services, each being an object with 'git', 'ref', and 'path' properties.

service.description: Specifies the service associated with the command
service.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.service': must be a string.

command.description: Represents the command to be executed
command.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.command': must be a string.

default_args.description: Specifies default arguments for the command
default_args.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.default_args': must be a string.

environment.description: Sets environment variables for the command
environment.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.environment': must be an object with properties representing environment variables, each being a string.

method.description: Specifies the Docker Compose method (e.g., up, run)
method.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.compose.method': must be a string.

compose_method.description: Alternative way to specify the Docker Compose method
compose_method.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.compose_method': must be a string.

run_options.description: Specifies additional options for Docker Compose run
run_options.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.compose.run_options': must be an array of strings.

profiles.description: Specifies Docker Compose profiles to use
profiles.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.compose.profiles': must be an array of strings.

compose.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.compose': must be an object with properties 'method', 'compose_method', 'run_options', and 'profiles'.

shell.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.shell': must be a boolean.

entrypoint.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.entrypoint': must be a string.

runner.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.runner': must be a string.

subcommands.description: Contains subcommands with the same structure as main commands
subcommands.errorMessage: Error in 'interaction.subcommands': must be an object with valid subcommand configurations.

interactionCommand.errorMessage: An interaction command can have both a 'command' and 'subcommands', along with other properties.
